name: Wathik
description: Wathik is a digital platform that streamlines the annual reporting process for local charities and CBOs in Jordan. Our platform simplifies the documentation process and increases the efficiency of these organizations.

sdgs.relevance:
SDG9: Industry¸ Innovation and Infrastructure
Our solution provides solid technology infrastructure for Local charities and CBOs to help them organize their data, making it easy for users to share their documentation with donors and government agencies

SDG17: Partnerships for the Goals
Our solution makes it easier for Local charities and CBOs to generate a well-structured report about them that can help them build partnerships in an easier way

dataPrivacySecurity.collectsPII: PII data is collected and stored but NOT distributed.
dataPrivacySecurity.dataPrivacySecurity: These data are stored in well secured database in a secured server

userContent.contentManagement: Content is collected and stored but NOT distributed.
contentTypes: We collect information about Local charities and CBOs and their projects
userContent.contentManagementPolicy: All the data are manually reviewed and moderated and we take action immediately when detecting inappropriate/illegal content, usually the average response time  is 24 hours but no data can be shared before review.

otherDeploymentOrganisations: Local charities and CBOs in Jordan

openAlternatives:
Twilio Api's 
You can either replace it with any WhatsApp API's you like to use or just stop the model since it's not a major feature to run the software
